text: Hello <#C22PU4LV8|general> <#CFPRTEGTX|modules> - I have a question for you all. We are looking to integrate some software with our HubSpot platform to handle a Live Auction. Have any of you had to do this? I'm looking for recommendations w/ pros and cons! Any info would be appreciated! Thank you!! <@U01QVR44MEY> - Any ideas or who would know?
Hi Brandon, did you ever get your question answered? I'm curious about it, too.
